title: Strengthening Community Leader Competencies Through Sports-Based Service Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of community development and experience in elementary educational settings
context.additional_context: Project-based education targeting elementary education institution managers/leaders aged 40+ to develop community problem-solving and leadership skills through sports activities

learning_goals: Plan and implement at least one sports-based service-learning project linked to community needs
Establish a collaborative system between learners and the community for at least three on-site applications
Develop the ability to measure and present project outcomes using quantitative and qualitative indicators

resources: Sports instructional materials and activity space

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
